text: Mohammed Zillur Rahman (9 March 1929 â€“ 20 March 2013) was the President of Bangladesh between 12 February 2009 and his death. He was a senior member of the Awami League. No other candidate filed to run in the presidential election. Rahman died on March 20, 2013 after being taken to Singapore City from an lung infection, aged 84. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Presidents of Bangladesh Category:Politicians from Dhaka Division Category:1st Jatiya Sangsad members Category:3rd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:7th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:8th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:9th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Zillur Rahman
